title.rendered: Today’s Match Prediction: Trinidad T10: Leatherback vs Scarlet,  Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
Time: 1 Mar, 00.00 AM IST

Venue: Brian Lara Stadium, Trinidad and Tobago

Pitch Report

The wicket is expected to remain slow. Light rain is forecast for this clash.

Teams

Probable XI for Leatherback: Aaron Alfred (wk), Christopher Vincent, Vishan Jagessar, Justin Joseph, Namir Suepaul, Stephan Soloman, Ryan Bandoo, Kamil Pooran, Amir Jangoo, Terrance Hinds (c), Daron Cruickshank

Probable XI for Scarlet: Tion Webster, Nicholas Sookdeosingh, Justin Jagessar, Kieron Pollard (c), Marlon Richards, Shiva Sankar, Bryan Charles, Vasant Singh, Ricky Jaipaul, Daniel Williams (wk), Rishad Harris

Fantasy Tips

We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Players to Watch out For

Although Leatherback lost their last match, Amir Jangoo opened the batting and remained unbeaten on 76.

Regardless of his form, Kieron Pollard is always going to be a dangerous customer in the shortest form. He can single-handedly change the fantasy league standings with the bat and ball.

Aaron Alfred is likely to help fantasy players with his glovework and willow.

Tion Webster can be inconsistent, but he has the ability to score quickly in the powerplay. Interestingly, he has also picked up a wicket in his last outing.

Not only did Vishan Jagessar pick 2 wickets in the last game but restricted the opposition batters from scoring freely.

Terrance Hinds should continue batting at No. 4 and also chip in with the ball.

Opening the batting, Nicholas Sookdeosingh scored 53 at a strike rate of 203, for which he also generated 41 fantasy cricket points.

For Scarlet, Vasant Singh and Rishad Harris are likely to be amongst the wickets.

Match Preview

Both teams are coming into this contest after losing their first two matches. It will be interesting to see which side manages to get their first win.

How excited are you for today’s match? Play fantasy cricket on the My11Circle today!
